variables.input:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| dedup agentName
| fields agentName

0.title: Details
0.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| filter in(agentName, array($AgentName))
| fields startDateTime, timestamp, agentName, duration

2.title: Call answered
2.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| filter in(agentName, array($AgentName))
| summarize countDistinct(call.id)

3.title: Average Call Answered per Agent
3.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| summarize countDistinct(call.id), by: { agentName }
| summarize avg(`countDistinct(call.id)`)

4.title: Call duration
4.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| filter in(agentName, array($AgentName))
| summarize avg(duration)

5.title: Call duration
5.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| summarize avg(duration)

7.title: Call Answered (by hour)
7.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| filter in(agentName, array($AgentName))
| fields startDateTime, timestamp, agentName, duration
| makeTimeseries count = count(), start=start(), interval:1h
| fields count = record(count = count[], timestamp = start[])
| expand count
| fields count = count[count], timestamp = formatTimestamp(count[timestamp], format: "HH")
| summarize { count = sum(count)}, by: { timestamp }
| sort timestamp asc

8.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| summarize `Call Anwsered` = countDistinct(dialogId), `Avg. Call Duration (s)` = avg(duration), by: { agentName }

9.title: Call Answered (by day)
9.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| filter in(agentName, array($AgentName))
| makeTimeseries count = countDistinct(dialogId), interval:1d

10.title: Call Answered (by day)
10.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_CallQueue"
| filter isNotNull(agentName)
| makeTimeseries count = countDistinct(dialogId), interval:1d
